original: Kusalaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalam magga hetukam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Kusalaṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: kusalam magga adhipatim dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
